DOC.brief_title: Use Low Dose HCG During Ovulation Induction With CC Women With CC Resistant PCOS
DOC.detailed_description: Women randomly divide two group ; CC-HCG group CC group . Women CC-HCG group receive CC ( 150 mg/day 5 consecutive day day 2 cycle ) HCG ( 200 IU/day SC day 7 cycle ) . Women CC group receive CC alone ( 150 mg/day 5 consecutive day day 2 cycle ) . Transvaginal sonography ( TVS ) scan perform regularly monitor follicular growth ( folliculometry ) ; start day 10 stimulation cycle repeat every 2-3 day . When least one follicle ≥ 18 mm diameter , final oocyte maturation induce intramuscular administration 10000 IU HCG time intercourse advise . If follicle ≥ 12 mm day 16 cycle , monitor follicular growth discontinue cycle presumed anovulatory . Ovulation document TVS scan one week trigger oocyte maturation confirm assess midluteal serum progesterone level . Each woman subject ovarian stimulation maximum 3 consecutive cycle except get pregnant first second cycle
